video.title: America: The Story of Us
video.synopsis: This miniseries highlights momentous events in U.S. history, including the arrival of the Pilgrims, the American Revolution and the lunar landing.

episodes.synopsis: From Jamestown to Plymouth, early settlers fight to survive; Tobacco sows seeds of opportunity in the south and the north becomes a trade powerhouse.
episodes.title: Rebels

episodes.synopsis: The colonies declare independence, taking on the British; George Washington is near defeat, but new tactics turn the tide; A new nation is born.
episodes.title: Revolution

episodes.synopsis: Trailblazing pioneers set out to conquer the vast continent west of the mountains, but find the land already claimed.
episodes.title: Westward

episodes.synopsis: The Erie Canal brings big risk and bigger reward; In the South, slavery fuels a growing divide; Violence flares and abolitionists stand for freedom.
episodes.title: Division

episodes.synopsis: The Civil War rages; The Confederate army can't match the Union's technology; railroads, supply lines and telegrams become new weapons in modern war.
episodes.title: Civil War

episodes.synopsis: The Transcontinental Railroad unites the nation; Native American civilizations decline; Cattle replace wild buffalo; Cowboys become an American icon.
episodes.title: Heartland

episodes.synopsis: Urban life introduces a new breed of social ills, set against the backdrop of stunning skylines and ambitious innovations.
episodes.title: Cities

episodes.synopsis: America strikes oil and the boom time begins; Henry Ford brings the motorcar to the masses; massive engineering projects modernize the West.
episodes.title: Boom

episodes.synopsis: Boom turns to bust when the stock market crash ushers in the Great Depression; dust storms blanket the Midwest; Roosevelt's New Deal signals recovery.
episodes.title: Bust

episodes.synopsis: The attack on Pearl Harbor brings America into World War II; the war effort revitalizes the nation's economy; a new global superpower takes the stage.
episodes.title: WWII

episodes.synopsis: America becomes a global superpower; technology fuels a boom in the economy and the population; America runs headlong into a new threat: Communism.
episodes.title: Superpower

episodes.synopsis: The Cold War tests the new superpower; the Challenger disaster and 9/11 shake the nation; technology drives America into the 21st century.
episodes.title: Millennium
